name: npm-package-template
author: Saad Ahmad <saadkwi12@hotmail.com>
description: This is a template for npm package

scripts.build: npx tsc --project tsconfig.prod.json; npx copyfiles -u 1 ./src/**/*.yaml dist/; npx copyfiles -u 1 ./src/**/*.json dist/
scripts.package:yarn: yarn build; bash ./packager.sh -p yarn -d dist; rm -r dist
scripts.package:npm: npm run build; bash ./packager.sh -p npm -d dist; rm -r dist
